results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ንጹሕ የተደረጉት የአላህ ባሮች ብቻ ሲቀሩ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእርሱ ላይም በኋለኞቹ ሕዝቦች ውስጥ መልካም ዝናን ተውንለት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
